enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve extracting text from the element, with ownText focusing on the element's own text nodes.
Both methods involve extracting text from the element, with text() returning the combined text of the element and its children.
Appending text to the element can affect the result of ownText() by adding new text nodes.
Prepending text to the element can affect the result of ownText() by adding new text nodes at the beginning.
